access_methods: Tools/Resources are automatically introspected by GoMCP
Schemas available via MCP protocol introspection
description: Schemas are automatically generated by GoMCP server at runtime
note: GoMCP provides automatic JSON schema generation via reflection

available_resources: logs/{level} - Server logs filtered by level
logs - All server logs with default filtering
resources.note: All resources registered with GoMCP automatically have schemas generated

automatic_features: JSON Schema generation from Go struct types
Automatic validation based on struct tags
tools.note: All tools registered with GoMCP automatically have schemas generated from their argument and result struct types
